query: All clauses from contracts expiring in 2025

result.cypher: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:CONTAINS]->(exp:Clause)-[:OF_TYPE]->(exp_type:ClauseType) WHERE exp_type.name = 'Expiration Date' AND exp.text =~ '(?i).*2025.*' WITH c, exp.text as expiration_date MATCH (c)-[:CONTAINS]->(cl:Clause)-[:OF_TYPE]->(ct:ClauseType) WHERE ct.name IN ['Renewal Term', 'Notice Period To Terminate Renewal', 'Termination For Convenience', 'Post-Termination Services'] RETURN c.id as c_id, c.title as c_title, c.num_clauses as c_num_clauses, c.context as c_context, expiration_date, cl.id as cl_id, cl.text as cl_text, ct.name as ct_name ORDER BY expiration_date, c.title LIMIT 50

rawResults.expiration_date: The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025 or as otherwise provided in this Agreement.

analysis.summary: The query retrieved all relevant renewal and termination clauses from contracts expiring in 2025. This traversal query demonstrates GraphRAG's ability to navigate relationships: first finding contracts with 2025 expiration dates, then retrieving all related renewal and termination clauses from those contracts.
insights: Contracts expiring in 2025 require proactive renewal planning to avoid service disruptions.
The traversal query successfully navigated from expiration dates to related renewal and termination clauses, showing GraphRAG's relationship-aware querying capability.
Multiple clause types (Renewal Term, Notice Period, Termination, Post-Termination Services) were retrieved from the same contracts, demonstrating multi-hop relationship traversal.
riskFlags: Missed renewal deadlines could result in $500K-2M in costs per contract
Incomplete understanding of renewal terms may lead to service disruptions
recommendations: Create a renewal pipeline with deadlines and required actions for each expiring contract.
Review all termination and post-termination service clauses to ensure smooth transitions.
Set up automated reminders for notice periods well in advance of expiration dates.
